criteria.details: Human score: 0.85 - Strong coverage of key provisions. Correctly identifies all leverage ratio tests (Senior 3.50x, First Lien 3.00x, Secured 6.00x) and major baskets ($2,250M credit facility, $400M/40% general basket). Non-guarantor cap mentioned but could be more prominent. Overall solid professional quality meeting the bar for independent work.

criteria.scoring_guide: Score 0-1 based on completeness and accuracy versus the criterion description.

Future guarantor $250M trigger correctly captured. Negative pledge identified. Missing: automatic release mechanic for equal-and-ratable liens (§4.07(b)). Core content sound but needs polish.
